parameters.name: by_longest_chain
parameters.description: get account by longest chain's head block or last irreversible block

AccountGasInfo.description: The message defines account gas information.

AccountGroup.description: The message defines a permission group.

id.title: permission name or key pair id

AccountPermission.description: The message defines the permission struct.

AccountPledgeInfo.description: The message defines account pledged coin information.

AccountRAMInfo.description: The message defines account ram information.

batch_index.title: transaction index of every batch execution

BlockInfo.title: The message defines block extra information

ContractABI.description: The message defines the ABI struct.

EventTopic.title:
- CONTRACT_RECEIPT: contract receipt
 - CONTRACT_EVENT: contract event

field.title: get the value from StateDB, fields is needed if StateDB[key] is a map.(we get StateDB[key][field] in this case)

GetBatchContractStorageRequestKeyField.description: The message defines GetContractStorage request params.

SignatureAlgorithm.description:
The enumeration defines the signature algorithm.

 - UNKNOWN: unknown
 - SECP256K1: secp256k1
 - ED25519: ed25519

TxReceiptReceipt.description: The message defines transaction execution receipt.

TxReceiptStatusCode.description:
The enumeration defines transaction receipt status code.

 - SUCCESS: success
 - GAS_RUN_OUT: run out of gas
 - BALANCE_NOT_ENOUGH: balance not enough
 - WRONG_PARAMETER: wrong parameter
 - RUNTIME_ERROR: runtime error
 - TIMEOUT: run out of time
 - WRONG_TX_FORMAT: wrong transaction format
 - DUPLICATE_SET_CODE: more than one set code action in a transaction
 - UNKNOWN_ERROR: unknown error

rpcpbAction.description: The message defines transaction action struct.

rpcpbAmountLimit.description: The message defines transaction amount limit struct.

tx_receipt_merkle_hash.title: transaction receipt merkle tree root hash

rpcpbBlock.description: The message defines the block struct.

rpcpbBlockResponseStatus.description:
The enumeration defines block status.

 - PENDING: pending in block cache
 - IRREVERSIBLE: irreversible

rpcpbCandidateBonus.description: The message defines the getCandidateBonus response.

net_name.title: the name of network, such mainnet or testnet

lib_witness_list.title: the active witness list of lat irreversible block

rpcpbChainInfoResponse.description: The message defines chain information response.

rpcpbContract.description: The message defines the contract struct.

rpcpbContractVote.title: The message defines the contract vote info

rpcpbFrozenBalance.description: The message defines the account's frozen balance.

lowest_gas_ratio.title: lowest gas ratio in head block

median_gas_ratio.title: median gas ratio in head block

by_longest_chain.title: get data by longest chain's head block or last irreversible block

rpcpbGetBatchContractStorageRequest.description: The message defines get batch contract storage request.

rpcpbGetBatchContractStorageResponse.description: The message defines get batch contract storage response.

by_longest_chain.title: get data by longest chain's head block or last irreversible block

rpcpbGetContractStorageFieldsRequest.description: The message defines get contract storage request.

rpcpbGetContractStorageFieldsResponse.description: The message defines get contract storage response.

field.title: get the value from StateDB, field is needed if StateDB[key] is a map.(we get StateDB[key][field] in this case)

rpcpbGetContractStorageRequest.description: The message defines get contract storage request.

rpcpbGetContractStorageResponse.description: The message defines get contract storage response.

rpcpbGetToken721BalanceResponse.description: The message defines get token721 balance response.

rpcpbGetToken721MetadataResponse.description: The message defines get token721 metadata response.

rpcpbGetToken721OwnerResponse.description: The message defines get token721 owner response.

rpcpbGetTokenBalanceResponse.description: The message defines get token balance response.

rpcpbNetworkInfo.description: The message defines network connection information.

rpcpbNodeInfoResponse.description: The message containing the node's information.

used_ram.title: how many bytes have been used

available_ram.title: how many bytes have not been used

sell_price.title: User can sell NUM bytes RAM to system to get `NUM * sell_price` IOSTs

buy_price.title: User can spend approximate `NUM * buy_price` IOSTs for NUM bytes RAM

rpcpbRAMInfoResponse.description: The message containing blockchain's ram information.

pre_tx_receipt.title: the tx_receipt of execution in advance

rpcpbSendTransactionResponse.description: The message defines send transaction response.

total_supply.title: the amount of total supply, the result is total_supply_float multiplied by deciaml

current_supply.title: the amount of current supply, the result is current_supply_float multiplied by deciaml

can_transfer.title: whether the token can be transfered

only_issuer_can_transfer.title: whether the token can only be transfered by issuer

rpcpbTokenInfo.description: The message defines the token information.

rpcpbTransactionRequest.description: The message defines the transaction request.

rpcpbTransactionResponseStatus.description:
The enumeration defines transaction status.

 - PENDING: pending in transaction pool
 - PACKED: packed in a block that has not been confirmed
 - IRREVERSIBLE: packed in a block that is irreversible

rpcpbTxReceipt.description: The message defines the transaction receipt struct.

rpcpbVoteInfo.description: The message defines the account's vote info.

rpcpbVoterBonus.description: The message defines the getVoterBonus response.
